entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
